div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 97 Lamia, Thessaly, c. 1936 (596) Burial: 4th cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 16 AR Aenianes: 1 ob. (as BMC 3-4) Heracleia Trachinia: 3 ob. (as BMC 2) Oetaei: 3 ob. (as BMC 3-4) Locri Opuntii: 5 ob. (as BMC 35) Boeotia: 1 ob. Sicyon: 3 ob. (as BMC 166) Disposition: formerly J. P. Shear coll. (stolen Dec. 1968) Information from owner
